column4: hello everyone... I'm very stressed and am hoping you guys can help me...
I'm trying like nobody's business to convert SHN (music) files to WAV
It's not recognizing the shortened files (aka SHN)
am not sure but you can try sox for convertion. i do not know if it will handle shn files
just check it out google it
ok... that's another problem... I need a gui....
the sox is truely simple let me check if it handle the file or not first
you don't understand... I'm trying to get a program that will be visually easy to use... NO command line... he can't understand it... seriously :)'
I'm so sorry.  What was the name of that program?  I'll take look....
Thank you again for your help.  I really appreciate it. :)
